video_identification.title: Rabbi Oded Mazor Burin, RHR Olive Harvest 2020, 3 Nov

extracted_metadata.title: Rabbi Oded Mazor Burin, RHR Olive Harvest 2020, 3 Nov
extracted_metadata.description: Rabbis for Human Rights member, Rabbi Oded Mazor of Jerusalem speaks from the olive groves of the West Bank Palestinian village of Burin. Rabbi Oded speaks of the importance of protecting the right to harvest of Palestinian farmers faced with the difficulties of the Occupation, violent settlers, and security force indifference.
